Name: A Shooty Bit
About the game: The world bears down from the top of the screen. There's no fire button. You can run and hide in the corner, or you can madly zip around, abstractly putting it in order. infinite endings - Because, really, you are the beginning and ending of the struggles you endure. dopamine rush - Look at that crunch. Look at that screenshake. It's just fun to play. surprises and mystery - There are very likely things in this game whose existence even the developer has forgotten. leaderboards - Show your points to people across the globe -
